content: everything is worked in one piece so there is minimal sewing materials & tools 15 yards worsted weight yarn 1 pair black 6mm safety eyes stuffing size e crochet hook size b crochet hook or similar the second hook is for the tail and should be small enough to make very tight stitches but the exact size doesn t matter need help with the ears try the photo tutorial on the primarily patterns blog here 1 1 http //primarilypatterns blogspot com/2014/09/sir-francis-pig-ear-phototutorial html
